passwordapplication.dao

Class BlackwordDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • passwordapplication.dao.BlackwordDAO

  • @Component
public class BlackwordDAO
extends Object
    Blackworddao is the class that handles the database operations for the Blackword-table, which hosts the words that cannot be use in passwords.
    Author:
    antti
